summary: For people who love the Custom Korean Voice Dayeon Follower mod but prefer a different appearance
descriptionHtml:
(Sorry, English is not my native language)

For people love the Custom Voice Dayeon Follower mod but prefer a different appearance

Body: CBBE HDT
Skin: 4k skin textures (make sure ur computer can handle this)

Load Order:
1. Original Dayeon Follower [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66559/?]here[/url]
2. My mod

Uninstall:
Deactive my file on MO or NMW or both

My other mod:
- Sofia Follower Rebirth [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85246/?]here[/url]
author: infinitywolf1
